channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mirror missing on street lamp, 19th June
item.description:
The mirror that was on the street lamp directly opposite to Naunton Park Road has been missing for about 5 months at least, it is a big issue for the cars turning out of Naunton Park Road as the ability to see oncoming traffic is nothing until you are already in the middle of the road. There could be an accident here as people come flying down Naunton Lane not realising that the traffic coming out of Naunton Park Road can't see them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kew Place, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass is covering walkways unclear verge edges, 19th June
item.description:
Harpfield Road and all around the area I notice Tewkesbury grass is very neatly cut regularly Itâ€™s been 3 years since this was cut Why do u only cut the larger grass areas?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harpfield Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kerbstone damaged on The Green triangle under tree, 19th June
item.description:
Badly damaged kerb stone. There is a tree on a triangular green at the junction of The Green and Stockwell Lane Woodmancote. On this triangle is a broken kerb.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Green, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded road lining on Zoons Court roundabout., 19th June
item.description:
Very badly faded lines around the roundabout making it hard for road users to know which lane to get in when using the roundabout. This is a hazard and they need refreshing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
